Yippee.  My problems is the peach fuzz on my face.  I look like I have really long blond side burns.  Is there any thing I can do for this!!!!!?????  I am so embarressed by it.  Thanks.  Jewels. Please! My gosh I love all these se!  Thanks Jewels
